text: Former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie declared that the U.S. economy needs to resume. When faced with revised projections that 3,000 people may die of COVID-19 per day, he said people "are going to have to" swallow that possibility. https://t.co/Z0GNeyJGUg via @HuffPostPol

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.
